titleStmt.title: A pastors legacy to his beloved people: being the substance of fourteen farewel sermons. By a Somersetshire minister. Taken from his mouth by one of his hearers. Now revised, and published at the entreaty and charge of his parishioners.
titleStmt.author: Fairclough, Richard, 1621-1682.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Dr. Williams' Library, London.
